person_analysis.overview: Alvina Yang is a University of Toronto CS Specialist and Mathematics Major based in Toronto, Canada. She is currently an SDE intern on Amazon’s SCOT Forecasting team and serves as VP Engineering at UTMIST, where she leads multi-team AI/ML projects. Her portfolio features award-winning hackathon work and practical, agentic LLM systems including real-time assistants on Meta Ray-Bans.
person_analysis.executive_summary: Alvina combines strong software engineering fundamentals with hands-on LLM/agent systems. With leadership at UTMIST, internships across Amazon/Seismic/QNX, and award-winning projects, she bridges frontend craft, backend services, and applied AI to ship impactful, demo-ready systems.
key_insights: Balances leadership (VP Engineering) with high-impact internships and research
Builds end-to-end, demo-ready agentic LLM applications on modern stacks
Strong community presence with 500+ connections and ~2.8K followers on LinkedIn
